holidays.title: National Lasagna Day
holidays.description: You don’t have to be Italian or a fat, orange cartoon cat to celebrate!

holidays.title: National Lipstick Day
holidays.description: Splurge on the high-end crimson lipstick you’ve been eyeing!

holidays.title: International Decora Day
holidays.description: Be ready to decorate yourself with as many accessories as possible on this fun day!

holidays.title: International Tiger Day
holidays.description: Let out a big roar — it’s the day of the big cats!

holidays.title: National Challenged Champions and Heroes Awareness Day
holidays.description: Raising awareness about this topic is something that cannot wait! Join us in commemorating this day!

holidays.title: National Cheese Sacrifice Purchase Day
holidays.description: Keep reading to learn the history of cheese and new ways of ‘sacrificing’ cheese.

holidays.title: National Chicken Wing Day
holidays.description: Sweet or spicy, let's raise a glass and down a few wings to celebrate.

holidays.title: National Get Gnarly Day
holidays.description: Embrace new ideas and get ready to do something exciting today.

holidays.title: National Harold Day
holidays.description: Celebrate all the past and present Harolds in the world this National Harold Day!

holidays.title: Paddle for Perthes Disease Awareness Day
holidays.description: Paddle for Perthes Disease Awareness Day is an annual event with a paddling contest.

holidays.title: Rain Day
holidays.description: Bring out your favorite umbrellas and raincoats to celebrate Rain Day!

holidays.title: Wallis and Futuna Territory Day
holidays.description: Everything you need to know about Wallis and Futuna Territory Day is here!

holidays.title: Angel Baby’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is a very talented rap artist and songwriter. Join us as we celebrate Angel Baby.

holidays.title: Jessica Lord’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no stopping this exceptionally talented actress and dancer’s rising career.

holidays.title: Jonah Love’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jonah Love is a social media personality and an outstanding musician who deserves attention.

holidays.title: Mia Xitlali’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are so many charms to discover with this rising star! Let’s celebrate her birthday!

holidays.title: Sadie Aldis’s Birthday
holidays.description: This media personality and influencer’s rising career is a force to be reckoned with.
